dashboard.settings.support.title: Support
dashboard.settings.support.description: Get help with your account or contact our support team.
dashboard.settings.support.subject: Subject
dashboard.settings.support.subjectPlaceh: What can we help you with?
dashboard.settings.support.messagePlaceh: Please describe your issue in detail...
dashboard.settings.support.faq1.question: How do I update my activity details?
dashboard.settings.support.faq1.answer: You can update your activity details by going to the Activities section, selecting the activity you want to edit, and clicking on the Edit button.
dashboard.settings.support.faq2.question: How do I manage bookings?
dashboard.settings.support.faq2.answer: You can view and manage all your bookings in the Bookings section. From there, you can confirm, reschedule, or cancel bookings.
dashboard.settings.support.faq3.question: How do I get paid?
dashboard.settings.support.faq3.answer: Payments are processed automatically and transferred to your registered bank account. You can view your payment history in the Revenue section.
